info.name: FIMFiction Dark Theme
info.description: A dark overhaul of FIM Fiction for those that like their eyes.
info.additionalInfo: Updated for the latest FIM Fic styles by the generous Cotton Fluff! FIM Fic has recently added its own night mode. As such, this style will aim to improve the new night mode rather than act as a replacement. Improvements to this theme are welcome! You can find the full css on Github. Please submit bug reports there or via PM on FIM Fic to either myself (quick_study) or Cotton.
